name: MUGGED
description:
MUGGED! Mugged is a small project made by one person, in Mugged you must protect and save MS Mug from all the nasty Mugs that are attacking! Make your way through the house and destroy Mugs along the way for some sweet points with weapons such as the knife and fork, but make sure you pick up some health points along the way, it can get quite tricky!  Also ragdolls. 

Controls; 

W A S D / Arrows - Move the character. 

Left Mouse - Attack 

 1 2 3 - Weapon select

Space - Jump 

Mugged does come with a simple save system, so don't worry about losing your score, but clicking "Clear Data" in the menu WILL remove your save. 

Remember to leave a rating if you had fun!

Also please let me know if you find any bugs!
